If you do not know retracement, Pls go to YouTube and learn what is Fibonacci retracement  Here is an example. Let’s say LTC June low was 70 & assume it jumps to 105 in July, that’s a 50% jump from the low.   Retracement  Back to 70 = 100% Crash to 58 = 127% Crash to 87.5 = 50%
